description: VideoPlayer let you to play video with segments progressive download. You can also seek to an unloaded part and change playback rate

members.description: The scaleMode method set different ways of sizing the video content. You can set scaleMode to "stretch", "letterbox", or "zoom"  letterbox : will shrink or enlarge the video to fit in parent container keeping video aspect ratio zoom : will enlarge the video to fit all the parent container keeping aspect ratio (loosing partial video areas if video ratio is different from parent ratio) stretch : will shrink or enlarge the video to fill all the parent container (loosing video radio if video ratio is different from parent ratio)
